channel.title: Indian country
channel.description:
The problems of social adjustment in the attitudes and through the words of the modern Native Americans.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: The Navajo makes his living
item.description: This program focuses on the Navajo people and how they make a living.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Navajo Indians.

item.title: The Indian family today
item.description: This program discusses the modern Native American family.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Navajo Indians.

item.title: The Sioux and what they want
item.description: This program focusses on members of the Sioux Nation and what they want.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Sioux Nation

item.title: The struggle for Indian education
item.description: This program takes a look at education for Native Americans.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Anthropology--United States.

item.title: The Indian at war
item.description: This program, "The Indian at War," looks at military service among Native Americans.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Sioux Nation

item.title: A look at Indian health
item.description: This program takes a look at the health of modern Native Americans.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Anthropology--United States.

item.title: A look at the Indian's future
item.description: The final program, "A Look at the Indian's Future," takes a look at what might lay ahead for Native American people.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Anthropology--United States.

item.title: The changing Indian
item.description: This program, "The Changing Indian," talks about the changes that have occurred in the typical Native American's life by the mid-20th century.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Navajo Indians.

item.title: Future for the reservation Indian
item.description: This program looks at what lies ahead for Native Americans who live on reservations.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Anthropology--United States.

item.title: On Indians past and present
item.description: In the first program of this series, Dr. Ruth Underhill speaks to Native Americans from the Sioux and Navajo peoples and seeks to understand how they have adjusted to life in modern America.
item.dc:creator: Underhill, Ruth, 1883-1984
item.dc:subject: Navajo Indians.
